\lsoffThus the genius alchemist known as Doctor Vemix was reduced to a mere sex toy.
\lsoffInstead of using the vulgar thing themselves, the party decided to simply sell it.
\lsoffSomewhere in Gianna, there's a girl with her cock stuffed into a piece of plastic that was once one of the greatest minds on the continent...
